hero.title: Sales Management Made Simple for Local Retailers
hero.subtitle: Track inventory, record sales, manage debts, and generate reports with an easy-to-use platform designed for your business.

features.title: Everything You Need to Manage Your Store
features.subtitle: Our platform provides all the tools you need to run your retail business efficiently and increase your profits.

inventory.title: Inventory Management
inventory.description: Keep track of your stock levels, get low inventory alerts, and manage product information.

sales.title: Sales Tracking
sales.description: Record all your sales transactions, including cash and credit sales, with an easy-to-use interface.

debts.title: Debt Management
debts.description: Track customer credit, set payment deadlines, and receive reminders when payments are due.

suppliers.title: Supplier Management
suppliers.description: Maintain a list of your suppliers, track orders, and manage relationships all in one place.

reports.title: Reports & Analytics
reports.description: Generate daily, weekly, and monthly reports to track your business performance and make informed decisions.

profit.title: Profit Tracking
profit.description: Monitor your profits and losses with visual reports that help you identify opportunities for growth.

testimonials.title: Trusted by Local Retailers
testimonials.subtitle: Join hundreds of store owners who have transformed their business with our platform.

testimonial1.name: Sarah Anderson
testimonial1.text: ShopSmart has completely transformed how I manage my grocery store. I can now track inventory and sales in real-time, which has reduced waste and increased my profits.

testimonial2.name: Michael Johnson
testimonial2.text: The debt tracking feature has been a game changer for my business. I no longer have to worry about forgetting customer credits, and the payment reminders are incredibly helpful.

testimonial3.name: Lisa Patel
testimonial3.text: The monthly reports help me understand which products are selling well and which aren't. This data has helped me make smarter purchasing decisions and grow my business.
